alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County Mountains; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 1:13PM PST until February 07 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Strongest winds in the mountains. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains, Santa Clarita Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys, Malibu Coast, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
